snippet: Turkey and the United States played down differences in the fight against Islamic State on Friday, but Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu made clear Ankara would keep pressing for a no-fly zone in Syria and President Bashar al-Assad's removal....

headline.print_headline: Turkey, U.S. Play Down Differences on Fight Against Islamic State
headline.main: Turkey, U.S. Play Down Differences on Fight Against Islamic State

lead_paragraph: Turkey and the United States played down differences in the fight against Islamic State on Friday, but Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu made clear Ankara would keep pressing for a no-fly zone in Syria and President Bashar al-Assad's removal.
